meanings.sent1: She compartmentalized her study materials by subject.
meanings.sent2: The teacher compartmentalized the classroom into different learning areas.
meanings.sent3: The chef compartmentalized the ingredients neatly on the counter.
meanings.sent4: His mind compartmentalized work and personal life like separate rooms.
meanings.sent5: The storage boxes compartmentalized the items for easy access.

meanings.definition: Separate into distinct parts or sections.
meanings.sent1: He compartmentalized his tasks to stay organized.
meanings.sent2: The company compartmentalized its departments for efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel compartmentalized its nuts in different hiding spots.
meanings.sent4: The artist compartmentalized the colors to create a beautiful painting.
meanings.sent5: The bookshelf compartmentalized the books by genre for easy browsing.
